title: Learn More: OPL Split 1 Watch Missions

replies.body: Suck that the rewards a purely just icons
That teemo emote is pretty cool tho

considering that this feature sometimes bugs out and doesn't acknowledge a game set you've sat there and watched for hours, despite being logged in, I'm kinda glad the watch rewards this time aren't too amazing.
Wow those rewards are terrible.  Couldn't even do a little 100 orange essence or something.  Cya
so just a bunch of shitty icons that do nothing? not worth the time
Watched 2 live games and still no reward ??
VoDs don't work either. It's great.
